name: Rebounding Leap

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Leaping lance class feature, Acrobatics 5 ranks, Ride 11 ranks.

sections.body: When you succeed at the Acrobatics check to jump as part of your leaping lance class feature, you can remount your steed as a swift action.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your riding and lancing expertise allows you to enter and leave the saddle with great speed.
